HERO.DESCRIPTION: Creating web applications to solve problems and improve user experience.

ABOUT.title: About Me
ABOUT.intro: Hi! I’m Julio Macías Caldera, a Full-Stack Developer currently focusing on frontend development. Although I’m currently focused on the visual part and user experience, my curiosity about programming has led me to explore both frontend and backend. I’m passionate about optimizing performance and ensuring that the code is clean, efficient, and delivers a seamless user experience.
ABOUT.story: My journey started as a Systems Administrator, which gave me the understanding of how everything fits behind the screen before diving into the world of web programming. Throughout my career, I have worked with technologies like HTML, CSS, React, Angular, and TypeScript, and I’m always looking to improve my skills in every project.
ABOUT.personality: I consider myself a creative yet detail-oriented person, with a technical approach and always looking for solutions to improve the quality and efficiency of the code. Outside of work, I love sports, video games, board games, and enjoying a good meal, which keeps me balanced and motivated.
ABOUT.cta: If you like what you see in my portfolio or want to collaborate, feel free to contact me. I’m ready to help bring your ideas to life!
